desc: C3 and GoldWell Hair Color | Take your favorite color line to the next level of efficiency with the C3 Color Conversion kit. Get yours today! Hair Colorists Worldwide are saving money. Beauty Salons around the world trust C3 Goldwell Conversions.

layout.text: With C3 Color Canister Conversion System, your favorite hair color line "GOLDWELL HAIR COLOR" is now the most efficient hair color line. "WORLDS #1 COLOR DUO"
